about.title: Speleo Studio
about.description: A comprehensive web application for cave visualization and survey management. Speleo Studio provides professional tools for cave systems 3D visualization and analysis.

features.survey: Survey data import from TopoDroid, Polygon, and JSON formats
features.export: Multiple export formats (PNG, DXF, Polygon, JSON)

confirm.resetConfig: Are you sure you want to reset the configuration?

welcome.title: Welcome to Speleo Studio
welcome.subtitle:
Your comprehensive cave visualization and survey management platform.
Explore, analyze, and visualize caves with a professional tool.
welcome.info: The help menu contains the Speleo Studio user manual.

confirm.deleteCave: Do you want to delete cave '{name}'?
confirm.deleteSurvey: Do you want to delete survey '{name}'?

tree.isolated: Survey is isolated from the cave network
tree.invalid: Survey has {nrInvalid} invalid, {nrDuplicate} duplicate and {nrOrphan} orphan shots

filter.noResults: No caves or surveys match the filter

projectManager.title: Project Manager

errors.syncInProgress: An other Google Drive operation is already in progress. Please wait for it to complete.
errors.projectNameAlreadyExists: A project with the name "{name}" already exists
errors.projectIdAlreadyExists: A project with the id "{id}" already exists
errors.caveIdAlreadyExists: A cave with the id "{id}" already exists, please  change the id of the cave to be imported
errors.nonMatchingCaveIds: Cave IDs in project do not match cave IDs from the caves
errors.projectRevisionMismatch: Project revision mismatch: {projectName} (revision {revision}) does not match Drive revision {driveRevision}

errors.failedToDecorateProjectItem: Failed to get Google Drive project information
errors.conflictSameRevision: Cave {name} with same revision has been modified by another app: "{app}". Sync will drop changes by the other app.
errors.conflictLocalChanges: Cave {name} has local changes. Sync will drop remote changes made by "{app}".
errors.conflictRemoteChanges: Cave {name} has remote changes made by "{app}". Sync will drop local changes since last successful sync.
errors.conflictProjectSameRevision: Project "{name}" with same revision has been modified by another app: "{app}". Sync will drop local changes since last successful sync.
errors.conflictProjectLocalChanges: Project "{name}" has local changes. Sync will drop remote changes made by "{app}".
errors.conflictProjectRemoteChanges: Project "{name}" has remote changes made by "{app}". Sync will drop local changes since last successful sync.

geo.utmZoneOrNorthernNeeded: Either zone number or northern needs to be set
geo.utmZoneOrNorthernBothSet: Either zone number or northern needs to be set, but not both
geo.eastingOutOfRange: Easting out of range (must be between 100 000 m and 999 999 m)
geo.northingOutOfRange: Northing out of range (must be between 0 m and 10 000 000 m)

geo.zoneLetterOutOfRange: Zone letter out of range (must be between C and X)
geo.latitudeOutOfRange: Latitude out of range (must be between 80 deg S and 84 deg N)
geo.longitudeOutOfRange: Longitude out of range (must be between 180 deg W and 180 deg E)
